name: Growing Yggdrasil
description:
Kenny 2022 game jam entry.

Each level has different waves of enemies that try to attack Yggdrasil.

 Build towers in the white spaces to defeat the enemies.

 If the enemy reaches the tree it will deplete its health.

 If Yggdrasil dies, game over.

 Towers can be upgraded and each tower type has a special effect.

 WIND: Following attack deal bonus damage.

 EARTH: Deals splash damage and stun enemies.

 FIRE: Deals damage over time.

 WATER: Slows the enemies down.

 The car's pollution will kill you tower over time, you can remove pollution faster by planting the CLEANING TREE.

 If the Yggdrasil grows nature is saved and the game is won.
